200.description: User usage by range fetched successfully

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Subscription type (required if encodedTag is provided). Only SS is supported for now.

parameters.name: encodedTag
parameters.description: Base64 encoded tag for Outline config. This paramter is optional. It is required only when type=ss.

post.description: This endpoint is forbidden to use via "API-key". It can be used only admin JWT-token.

delete.description: This endpoint is forbidden to use via "API-key". It can be used only admin JWT-token.

get.description: This endpoint is forbidden to use via "API-key". It can be used only admin JWT-token.
Get node users usage by range and node uuid

200.description: Nodes user usage by range fetched successfully

get.summary: Get node users usage by range and node uuid

200.description: Nodes usage by range fetched successfully
Inbound successfully added to all nodes
Inbound successfully removed from all nodes

info.title: Remnawave API v1.5.5
info.description:
Remnawave is a powerful proxy management tool, built on top of Xray-core, with a focus on simplicity and ease of use.

## Resources
* https://t.me/remnawave
* https://github.com/remnawave
* https://remna.st
